pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Murkrow was feared and loathed as the alleged bearer of ill fortune. This Pokémon shows strong interest in anything that sparkles or glitters. It will even try to steal rings from women.
pokedex_entries.sun: They awaken at dusk and take wing in the twilight, leading to the expression, “Get home before the Murkrow fly.”
pokedex_entries.moon: Seen as a symbol of bad luck, it’s generally disliked. Yet it gives presents—objects that sparkle or shine—to Trainers it’s close to.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It has a weakness for shiny things. It’s been known to sneak into the nests of Gabite—noted collectors of jewels—in search of treasure.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It searches for shiny things for its boss. Murkrow’s presence is said to be unlucky, so many people detest it.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It is believed that seeing this Pokémon at night will bring about ominous occurrences.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It appears near travelers to lure them into deep forests. It is said to bring misfortune.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Widely shunned as a bearer of ill fortune. Upon crossing paths with this creature, I’ve been told one must chant “Workrum, Workrum—bad luck, don’t come” as a protective incantation.

pokedex_entries.gold: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
pokedex_entries.silver: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.
pokedex_entries.crystal: It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.
pokedex_entries.ruby: NATU cannot fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. If your eyes meet with this POKéMON’s eyes, it will stare back intently at you. But if you move even slightly, it will hop away to safety.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: NATU has a highly developed jumping ability. The POKéMON flaps and leaps onto tree branches that are taller than grown-up people to pick at the tree’s new shoots.
pokedex_entries.firered: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It runs up short trees that grow on the savanna to peck at new shoots. A NATU’s eyes look as if they are always observing something.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.

pokedex_entries.gold: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
pokedex_entries.silver: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Its extremely soft feathers make no sound in flight. It silently sneaks up on prey without being detected.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: NOCTOWL never fails at catching prey in darkness. This POKéMON owes its success to its superior vision that allows it to see in minimal light, and to its soft, supple wings that make no sound in flight.
pokedex_entries.firered: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It unfailingly catches prey in darkness. NOCTOWL owe their success to superior vision that allows them to see in minimal light, and to their supple and silent wings.
pokedex_entries.diamond: Its eyes are special. They can pick out objects as long as there is the tiniest amount of light.
pokedex_entries.pearl: If it flips its head upside down, it’s a sign that it is engaged in very complex thinking.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: With eyes that can see in pitch-darkness, it never lets its prey escape. Some even call it “the emperor of dark nights.”
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: When it turns its head entirely upside down, you know it’s troubled by something. If you don’t leave it be, it will peck you.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
pokedex_entries.shield: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

pokedex_entries.gold: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.silver: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: OCTILLERY grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This POKéMON tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, OCTILLERY spews ink to escape.
pokedex_entries.firered: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It ensnares its foe with its suction-cupped tentacles before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, it spews ink to escape.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It obscures its foe’s vision by spitting a cloud of murky ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fellow OCTILLERY.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_entries.x: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_entries.y: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Octillery grabs onto its foe using its tentacles. This Pokémon tries to immobilize it before delivering the finishing blow. If the foe turns out to be too strong, Octillery spews ink to escape.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The ink it spits when escaping is special. It contains a substance that dulls the sense of smell, so Pokémon with keen noses get lost.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It usually sleeps in caves. The pitch-black ink that Octillery spits is also used for cooking.
pokedex_entries.sword: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedex_entries.shield: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It lives in the gaps of boulders and in holes on the seafloor. Its suction cups grip prey tightly.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It obscures its foe’s vision by spitting a cloud of black ink. It makes its nest among boulders.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: While Octillery still shoots water from its mouth, the drastic anatomical difference between it and Remoraid meant that for a long time, no one believed the former evolved from the latter.

pokedex_entries.gold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
pokedex_entries.silver: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.crystal: During the deserted morning hours, it comes ashore where it deftly uses its trunk to take a shower.
pokedex_entries.ruby: For its nest, PHANPY digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: PHANPY uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These POKéMON can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.
pokedex_entries.firered: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, this can be dangerous.
pokedex_entries.emerald: PHANPY’s big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.x: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
pokedex_entries.y: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: For its nest, Phanpy digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These Pokémon can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank. After playing in the mud, it won’t be able to settle down unless it washes its body.
pokedex_entries.violet: It is far stronger than it appears. If a Phanpy is swinging its trunk around and your arm gets hit by it, your arm bone will shatter.

pokedex_entries.gold: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
pokedex_entries.silver: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedex_entries.crystal: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.
pokedex_entries.ruby: PICHU charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: When PICHU plays with others, it may short out electricity with another PICHU, creating a shower of sparks. In that event, this POKéMON will begin crying, startled by the flash of sparks.
pokedex_entries.firered: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is still inept at retaining electricity. When it is startled, it discharges power accidentally. It gets better at holding power as it grows older.
pokedex_entries.diamond: The electric pouches on its cheeks are still small. They cannot store much electricity yet.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
pokedex_entries.platinum: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.
pokedex_entries.x: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
pokedex_entries.y: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Pichu charges itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry. You can hear the crackling of static electricity coming off this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: When Pichu plays with others, it may short out electricity with another Pichu, creating a shower of sparks. In that event, this Pokémon will begin crying, startled by the flash of sparks.
pokedex_entries.sun: It is not yet skilled at controlling electricity. If you take your eyes off it, it may shock itself.
pokedex_entries.moon: Despite this Pokémon’s cute appearance, those who want to live with one should prepare to be on the receiving end of its electric jolts.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It still can’t use electricity well. When it’s surprised or excited, it discharges electricity unintentionally.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It has electric sacs in its cheeks. When they’re fully charged, Pichu plays very energetically.
pokedex_entries.sword: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedex_entries.shield: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: The electric sacs on its cheeks are still small. They cannot store much electricity yet.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Pichu stores electricity in the sacs on its cheeks but discharges it inadvertently when agitated or excited. Being yet immature, the Pokémon’s handling of electricity is rather inept.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.
pokedex_entries.violet: Despite this Pokémon’s cute appearance, those who want to live with one should prepare to be on the receiving end of its electric jolts.

pokedex_entries.gold: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.silver: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This POKéMON uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.

pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A PILOSWINE is covered by a thick coat of long hair for enduring freezing cold. It uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: Its shaggy coat makes it unable to see. It checks surroundings with its sensitive nose instead.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Covered by a shaggy coat, it is strong against the cold. Its tusks of ice thicken when it snows.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Covered by a shaggy coat, it is strong against the cold. Its tusks of ice thicken when it snows.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: With its excellent sense of smell, it’s even able to find mushrooms that are buried under frozen ground.
pokedex_entries.x: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
pokedex_entries.y: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: The long fur of this Pokémon covers its eyes, ears, and even limbs, allowing Piloswine to resist harshly frigid conditions. The Pokémon’s white tusks can be used to defeat its enemies.

pokedex_entries.gold: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.
pokedex_entries.silver: It hangs and waits for flying insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.
pokedex_entries.crystal: It spits out a fluid that it uses to glue tree bark to its body. The fluid hardens when it touches air.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: PINECO hangs from a tree branch and patiently waits for prey to come along. If the POKéMON is disturbed while eating by someone shaking its tree, it drops down to the ground and explodes with no warning.
pokedex_entries.firered: It hangs and waits for flying-insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The extra weight doesn’t bother it.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A PINECO hangs from a tree branch and waits for prey. While eating, if it is disturbed by someone shaking its tree, it falls on the ground and suddenly explodes.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Motionless, it hangs from trees, waiting for its bug Pokémon prey to come to it. Its favorite in Alola is Cutiefly.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It sticks tree bark to itself with its saliva, making itself thicker and larger. Elderly Pineco are ridiculously huge.

pokedex_entries.gold: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
pokedex_entries.silver: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
pokedex_entries.crystal: When it expands its throat to croak out a tune, nearby POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL gather immediately.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: The curled hair on POLITOED’s head is proof of its status as a king. It is said that the longer and more curled the hair, the more respect this POKéMON earns from its peers.
pokedex_entries.firered: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
pokedex_entries.emerald: The curled hair on its head proves its status as a king. It is said that the longer and curlier the hair, the more respect it earns from its peers.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make POLIWAG obey.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make Poliwag obey.
pokedex_entries.x: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
pokedex_entries.y: If Poliwag and Poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: The curled hair on Politoed’s head is proof of its status as a king. It is said that the longer and more curled the hair, the more respect this Pokémon earns from its peers.
pokedex_entries.sun: They gather on moonlit nights to form a large chorus. Their cries sound angry and not at all pleasant, but they are certainly distinctive.
pokedex_entries.moon: It’s the leader of Poliwag and Poliwhirl. When Politoed roars, they all cower in fear.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Although its cries sound like screams, a composer created a beautiful ballad that was influenced by the sounds.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: The longer and more luxurious the curled hair on its head, the greater the number of Poliwag and Poliwhirl that will obey it.
pokedex_entries.sword: At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by letting out cries that sound like shouting.
pokedex_entries.shield: The cry of a male is louder than that of a female. Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find more popularity with the opposite gender.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: A group of Poliwag and Poliwhirl will form with a Politoed as the leader. Politoed’s cries make the Pokémon of the group obey.

pokedex_entries.gold: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can’t fly, though.
pokedex_entries.silver: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.crystal: This manmade POKéMON evolved from the latest technology. It may have unprogrammed reactions.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: PORYGON2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made POKéMON has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedex_entries.firered: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. However, it can’t even fly.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It was created by humans using the power of science. It has been given artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can’t fly, however.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.
pokedex_entries.x: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
pokedex_entries.y: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science. The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions on its own.
pokedex_entries.sun: For the purposes of planetary development, Porygon was updated with the most cutting-edge technology available.
pokedex_entries.moon: Porygon was updated to a new version in readiness for planetary development. But that dream remains unrealized as yet.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: AI has been installed in it. It learns various things all on its own, but it even remembers things it doesn’t need to know.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Even though it doesn’t die in the vacuum of space, it can’t move around very well in zero gravity.
pokedex_entries.sword: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.
pokedex_entries.shield: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology remains inscrutable.

pokedex_entries.crystal: It will not stay still, even while it’s a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: PUPITAR creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very durable - it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.

pokedex_entries.gold: This carefree POKéMON has an easy-going nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
pokedex_entries.silver: Due to its relaxed and carefree attitude, it often bumps its head on boulders and boat hulls as it swims.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: QUAGSIRE hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the POKéMON does not move, it does not get very hungry.

pokedex_entries.gold: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
pokedex_entries.silver: This POKéMON is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: QUILAVA keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This POKéMON applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
pokedex_entries.firered: This POKéMON is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.

pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns stronger as it prepares to fight.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: This creature’s fur is most mysterious—it is wholly impervious to the burning touch of flame. Should Quilava turn its back to you, take heed! Such a posture indicates a forthcoming attack.

pokedex_entries.gold: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
pokedex_entries.silver: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.
pokedex_entries.crystal: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent’s size.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: QWILFISH sucks in water, inflating itself. This POKéMON uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.

pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.

pokedex_entries.soulsilver: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
pokedex_entries.x: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
pokedex_entries.y: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Qwilfish sucks in water, inflating itself. This Pokémon uses the pressure of the water it swallowed to shoot toxic quills all at once from all over its body. It finds swimming somewhat challenging.
pokedex_entries.sword: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent’s size.
pokedex_entries.shield: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It shoots the poison spikes on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucking in water—it will soon attack by scattering the toxic spikes that grow all over its body.
pokedex_entries.violet: Experienced fishers say they try to catch Qwilfish in the brief moment that these Pokémon become defenseless just after launching poisonous spikes.

pokedex_entries.gold: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
pokedex_entries.silver: A POKéMON that races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.
pokedex_entries.crystal: This rough POKéMON stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: RAIKOU embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this POKéMON send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.

pokedex_entries.gold: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.
pokedex_entries.silver: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_entries.crystal: To escape from an attacker, it may shoot water out of its mouth, then use that force to swim backward.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: REMORAID sucks in water, then expels it at high velocity using its abdominal muscles to shoot down flying prey. When evolution draws near, this POKéMON travels downstream from rivers.
pokedex_entries.firered: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 100 yards.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A REMORAID uses its abdominal muscles to forcefully expel swallowed water, then shoot down flying prey. When evolution approaches, it travels down rivers.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It clings to MANTINE to feed on the big Pokémon’s scraps. This is an adaptation to avoid foes.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It forcefully squirts water. The water jet never misses prey even if the REMORAID is deep in the sea.

pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: This Pokémon clings to Mantine and shares in its prosperity. When its Mantine is attacked, Remoraid will fight alongside it!
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Also known as the “sniper of the seas,” its water gun can hit prey without fail from over 300 feet away.

pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Spits water from its mouth with incredible accuracy. It captures Burmy by shooting them down off the branches from which they dangle.

pokedex_entries.gold: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.
pokedex_entries.silver: Its wings are not used for flying. They are flapped at high speed to adjust its body temperature.
pokedex_entries.crystal: This POKéMON’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets a hold of into bits.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SCIZOR has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This POKéMON flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

pokedex_entries.sun: It uses its wings to adjust its body temperature. Otherwise, its metal body would become too hot and melt in the heat of battle.
pokedex_entries.moon: Once it has identified an enemy, this Pokémon smashes it mercilessly with pincers hard as steel.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Its body is like steel. Its tough, heavy pincers are more suited to smashing enemies than grabbing them.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Once it has identified something as an enemy, it will continue beating them with its steel-hard pincers until there’s nothing left but scraps.
pokedex_entries.sword: Bulky pincers account for one third of Scizor’s body weight. A single swing of one of these pincers will crush a boulder completely.
pokedex_entries.shield: Though its body is slim, Scizor has tremendous attacking power. Even Scizor’s muscles are made of metal.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Evolved by way of a curious item. The shell covering its body has been shown to be stronger than forged steel.

pokedex_entries.violet: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.

pokedex_entries.gold: A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.silver: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.
pokedex_entries.crystal: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: When SENTRET sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this POKéMON becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

pokedex_entries.silver: It stores BERRIES inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.
pokedex_entries.crystal: The fluid secreted by its toes carves holes in rocks for nesting and can be mixed with BERRIES to make a drink.

pokedex_entries.gold: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_entries.silver: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.crystal: The feathers that it sheds are very sharp. It is said that people once used the feathers as swords.
pokedex_entries.ruby: SKARMORY is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This POKéMON flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SKARMORY’s steel wings become tattered and bashed in from repeated battles. Once a year, the battered wings grow back completely, restoring the cutting edges to their pristine state.
pokedex_entries.firered: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but its bones are hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from SKARMORY to make swords and knives.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Its heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.x: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
pokedex_entries.y: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Skarmory is entirely encased in hard, protective armor. This Pokémon flies at close to 190 mph. It slashes foes with its wings that possess swordlike cutting edges.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Skarmory’s steel wings become tattered and bashed in from repeated battles. Once a year, the battered wings grow back completely, restoring the cutting edges to their pristine state.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its feathers, which fall off as it grows, are thin and sharp. In times long past, warriors used them as swords.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its metal body is sturdy, but it does rust rather easily. So on rainy days, this Pokémon prefers to stay put in its nest.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The wing feathers it sheds can be processed and made into knives whose sharpness is recognized by the finest chefs.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its body is draped in steel armor. It looks heavy, but it can fly at speeds of up to 185 miles an hour!
pokedex_entries.sword: The pointed feathers of these Pokémon are sharper than swords. Skarmory and Corviknight fight viciously over territory.
pokedex_entries.shield: People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Skarmory is clad entirely in ironhard armor. It flies at speeds over 180 mph.

pokedex_entries.gold: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
pokedex_entries.silver: It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun.
pokedex_entries.crystal: As soon as it rains, it closes its flower and hides in the shade of a tree to avoid getting wet.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SKIPLOOM’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees F. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this POKéMON is sometimes used as a thermometer.

pokedex_entries.leafgreen: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.

pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.

pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon is sometimes used as a thermometer.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the flower on the Pokémon’s head.
pokedex_entries.violet: When the weather grows cold, Skiploom’s flower closes and the Pokémon cannot photosynthesize, so it flies away to warmer regions.

pokedex_entries.gold: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
pokedex_entries.silver: When its head was bitten, toxins entered SLOWPOKE’s head and unlocked an extraordinary power.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Every time it yawns, SHELLDER injects more poison into it. The poison makes it more intelligent.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SLOWKING undertakes research every day in an effort to solve the mysteries of the world. However, this POKéMON apparently forgets everything it has learned if the SHELLDER on its head comes off.
pokedex_entries.firered: When its head was bitten, toxins entered SLOWPOKE’s head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Being bitten by SHELLDER gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

pokedex_entries.sun: A poisonous bite reacted with its system, blessing it with the enhanced intellect of a genius. It has full control of its psychic powers.
pokedex_entries.moon: This Pokémon is so famed for its intellect that a proverb still persists in some regions: “When in doubt, ask Slowking.”
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It’s constantly coming up with new ideas that would change the world, but as soon as it hits upon a new idea, it forgets it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It’s called “the sage of the sea.” It engages in battles of wits with Oranguru, but the result is usually a draw.
pokedex_entries.sword: Miraculously, this former Slowpoke’s latent intelligence was drawn out when Shellder poison raced through its brain.
pokedex_entries.shield: Slowking can solve any problem presented to it, but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of internationally recognized scientists.

pokedex_entries.gold: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.
pokedex_entries.silver: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.
pokedex_entries.crystal: These group together in areas that are hotter than normal. If it cools off, its skin hardens.
pokedex_entries.ruby: Molten magma courses throughout SLUGMA’s circulatory system. If this POKéMON is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SLUGMA does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely hot magma circulates throughout this POKéMON’s body, carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

pokedex_entries.leafgreen: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A SMEARGLE marks its territory using a fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. About 5,000 different marks left by this POKéMON have been found.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedex_entries.x: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
pokedex_entries.y: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this Pokémon have been found.
pokedex_entries.sun: The unique creations produced by each Smeargle are painted using the fluid that oozes from its tail. This is how it marks its territory.
pokedex_entries.moon: It draws symbols all over the place to mark its territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls are covered in graffiti.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The fluid of Smeargle’s tail secretions changes in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon’s emotions change.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.

pokedex_entries.gold: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.silver: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
pokedex_entries.crystal: The sensitivity of its lips develops most quickly. It uses them to try to identify unknown objects.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SMOOCHUM actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
pokedex_entries.firered: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It actively runs about, but also falls often. Whenever it falls, it will check its reflection on a lake’s surface to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedex_entries.x: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
pokedex_entries.y: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Smoochum actively runs about, but also falls quite often. Whenever the chance arrives, it will look for its reflection to make sure its face hasn’t become dirty.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: When it examines things, before touching them with its hands, it makes lip contact and then diligently licks all the dirt off its lips.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Highly perceptive sensors, Smoochum’s lips are kept moist by its daily application of tree sap.
pokedex_entries.sword: If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty, Smoochum doesn’t really seem to care.
pokedex_entries.shield: This is a very curious Pokémon. Smoochum decides what it likes and dislikes by touching things with its lips.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

pokedex_entries.gold: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
pokedex_entries.silver: Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and feasts on the eggs that are left behind.
pokedex_entries.crystal: This cunning POKéMON hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SNEASEL scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This POKéMON seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
pokedex_entries.firered: Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and feasts on the eggs that are left behind.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A SNEASEL scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. It seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It is extremely vicious and will not stop attacking until its foe is incapable of moving.
pokedex_entries.platinum: A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and scavenges any leftovers it can find.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: A smart and sneaky Pokémon, it makes its opponents flinch by suddenly showing the claws hidden in its paws.
pokedex_entries.x: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
pokedex_entries.y: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the bark. This Pokémon seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while the parents are away.
pokedex_entries.sun: It has a cunning yet savage disposition. It waits for parents to leave their nests, and then it sneaks in to steal their eggs.
pokedex_entries.moon: It uses its claws to poke holes in eggs so it can slurp out the insides. Breeders consider it a scourge and will drive it away or eradicate it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: They will cooperate to steal eggs from the nests of bird Pokémon, but fights break out to determine which one gets to eat the eggs.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It blends into the dark of night to ambush its prey. Sneasel will attack Sandshrew, but its hard skin can cause Sneasel’s claws to snap off.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
pokedex_entries.shield: It has a cunning yet savage disposition. It waits for parents to leave their nests, and then it sneaks in to steal their eggs.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It is extremely vicious and will not stop attacking until its foe is incapable of moving.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: This Pokémon shares roots with the Sneasel of Hisui, but unlike that species, this one is spiteful in personality. I hypothesize that water and earth can affect Sneasel’s mind and body.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.
pokedex_entries.violet: This is a smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.

pokedex_entries.gold: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.
pokedex_entries.silver: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
pokedex_entries.crystal: In truth, it is a cowardly POKéMON. It growls eagerly in order to hide its fear from its opponent.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: By baring its fangs and making a scary face, SNUBBULL sends smaller POKéMON scurrying away in terror. However, this POKéMON seems a little sad at making its foes flee.
pokedex_entries.firered: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.

pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

pokedex_entries.y: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

pokedex_entries.sun: Despite its intimidating face, it’s quite cowardly. Its desperate attempts to appear threatening make it popular with people.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its growls make its opponents uneasy. This laid-back Pokémon tends to sleep half the day.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It grows close to others easily and is also easily spoiled. The disparity between its face and its actions makes many young people wild about it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: In contrast to its appearance, it’s quite timid. When playing with other puppy Pokémon, it sometimes gets bullied.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by many people to be cute.

pokedex_entries.gold: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedex_entries.silver: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
pokedex_entries.crystal: If prey becomes ensnared in its nest of spun string, it waits motionlessly until it becomes dark.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: The web spun by SPINARAK can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this POKéMON can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web’s strands.
pokedex_entries.firered: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedex_entries.emerald: The web it spins can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that a SPINARAK determines its prey by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.

pokedex_entries.x: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
pokedex_entries.y: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: The web spun by Spinarak can be considered its second nervous system. It is said that this Pokémon can determine what kind of prey is touching its web just by the tiny vibrations it feels through the web’s strands.
pokedex_entries.sun: It waits intently until its preferred prey, Cutiefly, gets caught in its web. In fact, it’s quite a patient Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.moon: Some fishermen weave its sturdy thread into nets to catch fish Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy webs that won’t break even if you set a rock on them.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Although the poison from its fangs isn’t that strong, it’s potent enough to weaken prey that gets caught in its web.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong thread. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.

pokedex_entries.gold: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
pokedex_entries.silver: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
pokedex_entries.crystal: The round balls found on the fallen antlers can be ground into a powder that aids in sleeping.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: STANTLER’s magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this POKéMON was hunted close to extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.
pokedex_entries.firered: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Its curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
pokedex_entries.emerald: STANTLER’s magnificent antlers were once traded at high prices as works of art. As a result, this POKéMON was hunted close to extinction.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.

pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.

pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Its strangely shaped antlers have the power to bewitch those who see them. Medicine made by grinding up the black orbs from fallen antlers is an effective treatment for insomnia.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: This Pokémon apparently used to live in much harsher environments, and thus it once had stronger psychic powers than it does now.
pokedex_entries.violet: It’s said that this Pokémon used to be stronger long ago when it had many enemies, and that it was even able to evolve under its own power.

pokedex_entries.gold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
pokedex_entries.silver: It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
pokedex_entries.crystal: The many small metal particles that cover this POKéMON’s body reflect bright light well.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: STEELIX lives even further underground than ONIX. This POKéMON is known to dig towards the earth’s core. There are records of this POKéMON reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
pokedex_entries.firered: It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than diamond.
pokedex_entries.emerald: STEELIX live even further underground than ONIX. This POKéMON is known to dig toward the earth’s core, reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
pokedex_entries.diamond: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: It’s said that if an ONIX lives for 100 years, its composition becomes diamondlike as it evolves into a STEELIX.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The iron it ingested with the soil it swallowed transformed its body and made it harder than diamonds.
pokedex_entries.x: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
pokedex_entries.y: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
pokedex_entries.sword: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
pokedex_entries.shield: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: This Pokémon evolved through use of a strange item. Its body is coated with steel powder and notably hard—not even diamond can leave so much as a scratch.

pokedex_entries.gold: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.
pokedex_entries.silver: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
pokedex_entries.crystal: If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it’s a SUDOWOODO, not a tree. It hides from the rain.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SUDOWOODO camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. However, because the forelegs remain green throughout the year, the POKéMON is easily identified as a fake during the winter.
pokedex_entries.firered: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It mimics a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. But since its forelegs remain green throughout the year, it is easily identified as a fake in the winter.
pokedex_entries.diamond: Despite appearing to be a tree, its body is closer to rocks and stones. It is very weak to water.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It stands along paths pretending to be a tree. If it starts raining, it seems to disappear.
pokedex_entries.platinum: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.
pokedex_entries.x: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
pokedex_entries.y: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Sudowoodo camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. However, because its hands remain green throughout the year, the Pokémon is easily identified as a fake during the winter.
pokedex_entries.sun: To avoid attack, it mimics a tree. It will run off if splashed with water, which it hates.
pokedex_entries.moon: Apparently, the larger the green parts of this Pokémon, the more collectors value it. It’s a particular favorite among elderly people.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It’s so popular with the elderly that there’s a magazine devoted to this Pokémon. Fans obsess over the particular length and angle of its arms.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: The result of its holding the same pose all the time is arms that have become supple yet strong.
pokedex_entries.sword: If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it’s a Sudowoodo, not a tree. It hides from the rain.
pokedex_entries.shield: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: Though it looks like a tree, its body is actually more like rock or stone. The Pokémon is very weak to water.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It stands along paths pretending to be a tree. If it starts raining, it seems to disappear.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Though it pretends to be a tree, it fails to fool even children. To the touch, its body feels more like rock than tree bark. Sudowoodo’s extreme aversion to water merits special note.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
pokedex_entries.violet: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.

pokedex_entries.crystal: This divine POKéMON blows around the world, always in search of a pure reservoir.

pokedex_entries.gold: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.
pokedex_entries.silver: In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic manner, but it comes to a complete stop when the sun sets.
pokedex_entries.crystal: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this POKéMON’s face become more vivid and lively.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: SUNFLORA converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.

pokedex_entries.emerald: SUNFLORA convert solar energy into nutrition. They are highly active in the warm daytime but suddenly stop moving as soon as the sun sets.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic manner, but it comes to a complete stop when the sun sets.

pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedex_entries.emerald: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN.
pokedex_entries.diamond: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.
pokedex_entries.pearl: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
pokedex_entries.platinum: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedex_entries.x: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedex_entries.y: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: Because the Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether written language or Unown came first.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly living creatures. I’ve pointed out that the species’ many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.

pokedex_entries.gold: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.
pokedex_entries.silver: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: In the forests inhabited by URSARING, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This POKéMON walks through its forest gathering food every day.
pokedex_entries.firered: With its ability to distinguish any smell, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap stout trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.
pokedex_entries.emerald: In forests, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where an URSARING gathers food. It walks through its forest collecting food every day.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen berries.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.

pokedex_entries.y: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This Pokémon walks through its forest gathering food every day.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: When the cold season arrives in Hisui, this Pokémon will wander fields and mountains alike in search of its favorite berries. Ursaring’s hunger during this time makes it a ferocious danger.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It usually wears a hardened expression, but when it’s licking up honey—which it loves—the joy it feels will cause it to break into a wide grin.
pokedex_entries.violet: It is quite skilled at climbing trees. If it comes across a Primeape while searching for berries in the treetops, trouble will surely ensue.

pokedex_entries.gold: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
pokedex_entries.silver: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
pokedex_entries.crystal: In order to conceal its black tail, it lives in a dark cave and only moves about at night.
pokedex_entries.ruby: If two or more WOBBUFFET meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo each other’s endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. TRAINERS need to beware of this habit.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: WOBBUFFET does nothing but endure attacks - it won’t attack on its own. However, it won’t endure an attack on its tail. When that happens, the POKéMON will try to take the foe with it using DESTINY BOND.
pokedex_entries.firered: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Usually docile, a WOBBUFFET strikes back ferociously if its black tail is attacked. It makes its lair in caves where it waits for nightfall.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.

pokedex_entries.gold: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
pokedex_entries.silver: When it walks around on the ground, it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous film.
pokedex_entries.crystal: A mucous membrane covers its body. Touching it barehanded will cause a shooting pain.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: WOOPER usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey, toxic film.
pokedex_entries.firered: When it walks around on the ground, it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous film.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
pokedex_entries.emerald: WOOPER usually live in water but come out onto land seeking food occasionally. On land, they coat their bodies with a gooey, toxic film.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It lives in cold water, half burying itself in mud at the bottom to sleep.
pokedex_entries.pearl: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.
pokedex_entries.platinum: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

pokedex_entries.gold: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedex_entries.silver: In South America, it is said that its right eye sees the future and its left eye views the past.
pokedex_entries.crystal: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
pokedex_entries.ruby: XATU stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this POKéMON does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: XATU is known to stand motionless while staring at the sun all day long. Some people revere it as a mystical POKéMON out of their belief that XATU is in possession of the power to see into the future.
pokedex_entries.firered: In South America, it is said that its right eye sees the future and its left eye views the past.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It has the enigmatic power of foreseeing the future. Some people in different lands have long believed that XATU are emissaries from another world.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: In South America, it is said that its right eye sees the future and its left eye views the past.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.
pokedex_entries.x: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
pokedex_entries.y: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Xatu stands rooted and still in one spot all day long. People believe that this Pokémon does so out of fear of the terrible things it has foreseen in the future.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Xatu is known to stand motionless while staring at the sun all day long. Some people revere it as a mystical Pokémon out of their belief that Xatu is in possession of the power to see into the future.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It’s said that while this Pokémon has the power to predict the future, it’s not powerful enough to change the future it sees.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: While it can see the future, it has no desire to change it, which is probably why it remains motionless at all times.
pokedex_entries.sword: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedex_entries.shieldbrilliant_diamondshining_pearl: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.

pokedex_entries.gold: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
pokedex_entries.silver: Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey.
pokedex_entries.crystal: It can see in all directions without moving its big eyes, helping it spot attackers and food right away.
pokedex_entries.rubysapphire: YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This POKéMON uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.
pokedex_entries.firered: Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It can see 360 degrees without moving its eyes. It is a great flier capable of making sudden stops and turning midair to quickly chase down targeted prey.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It can hover in one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.
pokedex_entries.heartgold: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
pokedex_entries.soulsilver: Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It can hover in one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: By flapping its wings at high speed, it can fly freely through the air. Even sudden stops are no problem.
pokedex_entries.x: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.
pokedex_entries.y: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
pokedex_entries.omega_rubyalpha_sapphire: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without the Pokémon moving its head. It won’t miss prey— even those behind it.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Its frail wings are so thin that one can see clear through them. However, during flight these wings exhibit the power to churn air with force enough to launch a house skyward.
